defaults.content: defaults → dict (Read Only): A dictionary of preferences with their default values.

save.content: save()→ None: Save preference values to disk.  Unless saved, changes to preferences will be lost, next time application is started.

resetToDefaults.content: resetToDefaults()→ None: Reset all preferences to their default values.

load.content: load()→ None: Restore preference values from disk.

len.content:
len(Preferences)→ int: Returns the total number of preferences.
a = len(ui.preferences)

[].content:
[<preference name>]→ value: Get or set specific preference given a preference name key.
v = ui.preferences['dats.autoindent']
ui.preferences['dats.autoindent'] = 0

iterator.content:
Iterator→ str: Iterate over each preference name.
for p in ui.preferences:
	print(p) # print the name of all preferences TouchDesigner Build:
